cluster_relations.rel_desc: Adult butterflies consume nectar as a food source.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Subject organism consumes the object as a food resource.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The proboscis is used by butterflies to feed on nectar.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Subject structure is used as an instrument by the organism to feed on the object resource.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Subject structure is used as an instrument by the organism to feed on the object food resource.
args.justification: Refines the canonical predicate to a more natural and reusable form consistent with the raw relation hint ('used_for_feeding_on'), while keeping it clearly instrumental and feeding-specific. The previous form ('used_to_feed_on') was slightly awkward and less descriptive for schema reuse.

executed_decisions.canonical_rel_desc: Subject structure is used as an instrument by the organism to feed on the object food resource.
executed_decisions.justification: Refines the canonical predicate to a more natural and reusable form consistent with the raw relation hint ('used_for_feeding_on'), while keeping it clearly instrumental and feeding-specific. The previous form ('used_to_feed_on') was slightly awkward and less descriptive for schema reuse.
